### Wastewater Treatment Plant (WWTP) Upgrades – Atlantic Institution, Renous, New Brunswick

**Reference Number:** WS4549967381

**Amendment Number:** 12

**Posting Date:** 2024-05-21

**Bid Closing Date:** 2024-07-17T14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
This project invitation invites qualified suppliers to participate in a two-phase process to upgrade the Wastewater Treatment Plant (WWTP) at the Atlantic Institution, located in Renous, New Brunswick.

**Project Details:**
This is the second phase of a two-phase process: Phase One solicited proposals from suppliers to provide designs and specifications for the project. Qualified suppliers, who submitted proposals in response to Phase One, are now invited to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings provided.

**Contracting Entity and End User Entity:**
The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), and the end user entity is also the PSPC.

**Contract Location and Postal Code:**
The project is to be delivered on-site at the Atlantic Institution, located in Renous, New Brunswick, with a postal code of K1A 0S5.

**Notice and Tenders:**
The notice and tender documentation for this project can be downloaded from the Government of Canada website. The contact information for the person responsible for this project is provided below.

**Contact Information:**

* Edward Johnston, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available
* Address: Not Available

**Trade Agreements:**
This project is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and others.

**Procurement Category:**
This project falls under the Building and Facility Maintenance and Repair Services category. The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.
